item.description:
This family friendly event will include live music and national and local speakers covering a variety of topics relating to limited government and individual liberty in Massachusetts and nationwide. Live music from People's Blowback starting at noon.

MC - Tom Duggan, Publisher, Valley Patriot newspaper, Radio talk host

Keynote - Grover Norquist, President, Americans for Tax Reform 

Dr. Keith Ablow - Author, FOX News expert on psychiatry

Ron Shaich - Cofounder, No Labels (No Budget, No Pay), CEO/Founder, Panera Bread

Special appearance by hip hop artist Andres "DraMatik" Gonzales

Jeff Kuhner - Radio talk host, WRKO

Jim Wallace - Executive Director, Gun Owners' Action League (GOAL)                                              

Alexis Monahan – Students for Liberty

Todd Feinburg - Radio talk host

Aaron Goldstein - Writer, American Spectator
Paul Craney – Executive Director, Massachusetts Fiscal Alliance
Andrea Taber – President/Founder, Ever So Humble Pie Company, AKA "Whoopie Pie Lady"

Jessica Vaughan - Director of Policy Studies, Center for Immigration Studies
Jake Danishevsky – Soviet-born American Jew, Author, "AfterTastes and Tales from Russia"

Jeff Katz – Coach, Columnist, Broadcaster
item.name: Tax Day Tea Party Rally
